reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Once the taxi driver from the airport managed to find the hotel, our first impression was good. It was in a great, central location, the reception was modern and clean and the guy who checked us in was really friendly.
reviews.title: A mixed reaction ...

likes.disliked: — Location - so noisy it wasn't funny

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was small but had everything you needed and was clean. The balcony was very small (if you both sat on a seat then your knees touched) and overlooked the main strip with bars on.
reviews.title: Great little place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The noise from the strip on our first night was so unbearable, we asked to move to a room facing the other street, which made a huge difference (and had a slightly bigger balcony).
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel.
Excellent situation
reviews.text: The staff were friendly (they booked us a day trip to Lisbon and the taxi back to the airport, which was so much cheaper than the taxi there) and the rooms cleaned every day.

reviews.title: Lovely Hotel, great staff, close to all one would need
reviews.text: However, breakfast was a depressing affair - each table was laid with 4 bread rolls, 2 slices of ham and cheese and a blister pack of jam each - washed down with orange squash. Avoid at all costs and go to the main square for something far more appetising.

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.text: I have recently spent the week at Hotel Baltum, Albufeira.....the hotel was ok but there were a few problems. There were 3 of us including a 3 year old child so we were a little surprised to get to our room and find sockets hanging off the wall, the lock on the bathroom door kept gettin stuck resulting in the hotel staff making us pick the lock over and over again, the toilet was broken also. Hotel staff were friendly, the reception area was lovely and overall it wasn't a bad hotel, I just wouldnt reccommend taking a small child there due to the dangers in the room that I experienced.

reviews.title: great place
reviews.text: this hotel was better than some 3 star hotels , clean,well run,and the staff were great. breakfast was a bit bland but it was fresh & you could have as much as you wanted .hell ,its suposed to be 2 star any moaners should get a life .will definately go back
The location is superb, just a minutes walk to the beach, and the same to the town square with all it's bars and restaurants.
reviews.title: a lovely trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My room was small, but spotlessly clean and comfortable, and the balcony overlooked the main street.
reviews.title: Great fun!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn't find the staff particulrly friendly - not unfriendly either, just not very interested!
reviews.title: Great holtel , wonderful location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was fine - ok it was the same everyday, but the rolls were lovely and fresh, and I found it a perfectly adequate start to the day. The coffee is absolutely disgusting, but that was not a problem because I took my own travel kettle, so I just had a coffee sitting on my balcony after breakfast instead.
reviews.title: Good and bad

reviews.text: When traveling with friends sometimes you have to make concessions... well this place was certainly mine! It's proudly a 2 star motel through and through... I will say the location was great... 2 mins from the beach and main square... and the rooms are kept clean... but it's still pretty dumpy.
reviews.title: It's all about the location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is a two minute walk to the beach. This may be no big deal but most people are situated at the top of the hill which is fine coming down but a nightmare after a long day on the beach.
reviews.title: Location, Location, Location.

likes.disliked: — noise from bars late at night

reviews.text: The old town square with all of the bars and restaurants is 2 minutes in the other direction (Casa de Sangria is a must).
reviews.title: brilliant place to stay

reviews.text: The hotel staff are business like. Efficient but not too friendly. Our room was small but clean. I would say go room only and skip breakfast, very boring, there are only so many ham & cheese rolls you can eat in one week.
reviews.title: loved the views

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definately return here for a hastle free beach holiday.
reviews.title: Good and Cheap
